title: Discovery QRD-068: constraint_relaxation

core_mechanism: Core mechanism: A deterministic and composable architecture relaxing constraints on Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(QuantumAlgorithm) enabling breakthrough operational regimes with unique advantages through 2 interaction patterns

function apply_constraint_relaxation(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(QuantumAlgorithm))
